welcome.text: Welcome to a space to pause, reflect, and reconnect with clarity and calm…

cacaoAndMe.name: Cacao and Me
cacaoAndMe.description: For me, cacao is more than a drink—it is a gentle way to pause, be in the moment, and reconnect with myself. Through cacao mindfulness practice, I have found calm, focus, and appreciation for simple moments.

cacaoMindfulness.name: Cacao Mindfulness Practice
cacaoMindfulness.description: Cacao mindfulness practice combines warm cacao with reflection and presence. It offers a simple and effective way to slow down, reduce stress, and create space for clarity and balance in everyday life.

about.title: About Cacao Mindfulness Practice
about.description1: offers a structured way to pause, recharge, and sharpen focus. With the support of ceremonial cacao, practical mindfulness tools, and a calm setting, you step out of daily demands and give space for clarity and presence.
about.description2: Once a month, we gather in a small group (around 10 participants) for an evening designed to support everyone – whether you are leading others, studying, between jobs, or simply seeking balance in everyday life. The practice creates conditions for reflection, renewed perspective, and clarity.

expectations.title: What to Expect

items.description: ceremonial cacao prepared with homemade oat milk or water, a touch of salt, and honey. This natural drink supports focus, balance, and calm energy.
short, practical breathing and awareness exercises, guiding you through all five senses to bring presence and clarity.
live sounds and instruments to encourage relaxation and a fresh perspective.
optional, a brief round to share experience from the practice.

expectations.experience: No previous meditation experience is required.
expectations.language: The sessions are held in Norwegian, but you are welcome to respond in English, Latvian, or Russian.

practicalInfo.title: Practical Information
contributionOptions: Clip-card (3 sessions: 660 NOK) – recommended for those who want to build continuity and strengthen the effect of the practice over time. The card is valid for 6 months.
practicalInfo.orUseLinks: or use the upcoming event links
practicalInfo.cancellation: If you can't attend, please send an SMS at least 24 hours before.
practicalInfo.cancellationFee: If not, we kindly ask you to cover the event fee, as the cacao and materials will already be prepared.

about.leadingText: From time to time, people ask me: "How did you come to cacao mindfulness practice?" Here is my story.

howItBegan.title: How it began
paragraphs: In the autumn of 2020, I faced something I had never experienced before — emotional breakdowns at work. Some days, even the smallest event felt overwhelming. At that time, I held a leadership role in a high-pressure industry where the expectations were relentless. On the outside, I appeared strong. On the inside, I was burning out.
A visit to my doctor confirmed what I already knew: burnout. I was given two choices — take a long sick leave, or make a significant change. I chose change.

I have always loved working, solving challenges, and leading with a strategic mindset. But I realized that to continue in leadership, I needed a new approach — one that would not only restore my energy but also make my performance sustainable.

searchForBalance.title: The search for balance
paragraphs: Changing workplace reduced the immediate stress, but my energy was still low. I wanted to understand what was happening inside me and how to rebuild resilience in a lasting way.

This search led me to Tunsbergs Medical School, where I completed a two-year course in Basic Medicine (Grunnmedisin). Alongside medical knowledge, I explored mindfulness practices and other evidence-based methods that support recovery, focus, and mental clarity.

I also learned that some of the world's top leaders take time away on retreats to restore their energy, sharpen focus, and improve creativity. That inspired me to experiment with new approaches that could help me manage pressure and perform more sustainably.

turningPoint.title: The turning point
paragraphs: In June 2022, I attended my first retreat. One of the first gatherings was a cacao ceremony — my very first experience with ceremonial cacao.

The experience was unlike anything I had known before. After drinking warm cacao and listening to dedicated music, I felt carried into a special flow. For some, it was sounds that stirred emotions and memories; for me, it was images and impressions that surfaced, offering new perspective. That moment became the true beginning of my cacao journey.

whatCacaoGaveMe.title: What cacao gave me
paragraphs: Cacao did not "cure" burnout overnight. But it gave me tools that created lasting change:
Over time, cacao became more than a drink — it became a practice of balance. I discovered that mindfulness doesn't weaken strong thinking or leadership — it makes it sustainable.
listItems: To pause and regulate my nervous system under pressure.
To ground myself when my mind was overloaded.
To welcome emotions instead of pushing them aside.
To recover clarity, energy, and focus in a sustainable way.

creatingPractice.title: Creating the Cacao Mindfulness Practice
paragraphs: Eventually, I felt it was time to share this practice with others. That is how the Cacao Mindfulness Practice was born — evenings of candlelight, ceremonial cacao, mindful breathing, live music, reflection, and connection.
These practices are not about escape. They are about resilience. They create a pause in the middle of busy, demanding lives — a pause that restores energy, focus, and calm.

For me, cacao has become more than a personal ritual. It is a leadership wellness tool — a simple yet powerful way to prevent burnout, support clarity, and strengthen resilience in business and beyond.

signature.invitation: I invite you to join me in this practice — to share a cup of warm cacao, take a pause from everyday life, and reconnect with yourself.
signature.name: Inguna

items.message: Kakaomeditasjon har blitt en måte for meg å øve på å være helt til stede i nuet. Inguna skaper en trygg atmosfære og har en egen evne til å holde energien i rommet slik at tankene faller til ro. Hver gang er opplevelsen litt annerledes, men jeg sitter alltid igjen med den samme følelsen: ‘Dette var nøyaktig det jeg trengte.’
items.name: Participant, Ålesund

items.message: Because of my profession and daily habits, my mind is usually running non-stop whenever I’m awake. When I join a Cacao mindfulness practice, the atmosphere helps me relax and quiet my thoughts almost instantly. I settle into a calm state of being present, here and now. Along the way, I often experience meaningful visions and insights that support me both personally and professionally. The practice gives my mind the restorative pause it needs to return to full speed afterwards.
items.name: Girts, Ålesund
